name: Agile Shield Grip
summary: You change your grip on the shield, allowing you to combine rapid attacks with your shield boss or shield spikes and your main weapon's Strikes in a series of swift motions.

name: Deity's Domain
summary: You embody an aspect of your deity.

name: Desperate Prayer
summary: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

name: Everstand Stance
summary: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

name: Iron Repercussions
summary: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

name: Ongoing Selfishness
summary: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

name: Ranged Reprisal
summary: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

name: Splinter Faith
summary: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

name: Unimpeded Step
summary: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

name: Vicious Vengeance
summary: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

name: Weight of Guilt
summary: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

name: Conceited Mindset
summary: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

name: Devoted Guardian
summary: You adopt a wide stance, ready to defend both yourself and your chosen ward.

name: Divine Grace
summary: You call upon your deity’s grace.

name: Dragonslayer Oath
summary: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

name: Esoteric Oath
summary: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

name: Fiendsbane Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

name: Lightslayer Oath
summary: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

name: Reliable Squire
summary: You know the path to victory isn't traveled alone, and you lend aid to your companions whenever you can.

name: Resilient Mind
summary: You're firm in your convictions and have girded your mind against outside influence.

name: Shining Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

name: Vengeful Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

name: Accelerating Touch
summary: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

name: Aura of Courage
summary: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

name: Aura of Despair
summary: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

name: Cruelty
summary: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

name: Divine Health
summary: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

name: Everstand Strike
summary: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

name: Inspiring Resilience
summary: You show defiance in times of hardship and inspire your companions to persevere.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Knock Sense
summary: You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own.

name: Light of Revelation
summary: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

name: Mercy
summary: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

name: Sacral Lord
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
summary: By right of ritual or sheer stubbornness, you have claimed rulership of the land.

name: Sun Blade
summary: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

name: Attack of Opportunity
summary: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Corrupted Shield
summary: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

name: Invigorating Mercy
summary: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

name: Litany Against Wrath
summary: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

name: Loyal Warhorse
summary: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

name: Shield Wall
summary: You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade.

name: Smite Evil
summary: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

name: Smite Good
summary: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

name: Advanced Deity's Domain
summary: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Greater Cruelty
summary: The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

name: Greater Mercy
summary: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

name: Heal Mount
prerequisite: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (_lay on hands_)
summary: Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy.

name: Impassable Wall Stance
summary: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

name: Quick Shield Block
summary: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

name: Sacrifice Armor
summary: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

name: Second Ally
summary: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

name: Sense Evil
summary: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

name: Sense Good
summary: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

name: Devoted Focus
summary: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

name: Elucidating Mercy
summary: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

name: Holy Light
trait: Champion, Cleric, Concentrate, Divine, Evocation, Light, Uncommon
summary: You raise your arms to the sky and pray fervently, surrounding yourself in a beacon of holy light.

name: Imposing Destrier
summary: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Litany Against Sloth
summary: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

name: Litany of Self-Interest
summary: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

name: Radiant Blade Spirit
summary: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

name: Resilient Touch
summary: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

name: Shield of Reckoning
summary: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

name: Affliction Mercy
summary: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

name: Amplifying Touch
summary: Your healing energies empower attacks.

name: Aura of Faith
summary: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

name: Blade of Justice
summary: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
summary: You can suffer so that others might live.

name: Divine Wall
summary: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

name: Enforce Oath
prerequisite: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
summary: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

name: Gruesome Strike
prerequisite: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
summary: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

name: Lasting Doubt
summary: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

name: Liberating Stride
summary: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

name: Miraculous Intervention
summary: Through divine intervention or whispered prayers, you foil an enemy's response.

name: Necromantic Deflection
summary: You imbue your shield with life-giving energy to deflect harmful necromantic magic.

name: Pale Horse
summary: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

name: Anchoring Aura
summary: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

name: Aura of Life
summary: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

name: Aura of Preservation
summary: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

name: Aura of Righteousness
summary: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

name: Aura of Vengeance
summary: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

name: Divine Reflexes
summary: You can use your champion's reaction more.

name: Greater Interpose
summary: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

name: Litany of Depravity
summary: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

name: Litany of Righteousness
summary: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

name: Sacral Monarch
prerequisite: Sacral Lord; Master in Occultism or Master in Religion
summary: You have come into your full powers and are truly a monarch of your realm, by your own definition at least.

name: Wyrmbane Aura
summary: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

name: Auspicious Mount
summary: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

name: Expand Aura
prerequisite: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
summary: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

name: Instrument of Slaughter
summary: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

name: Instrument of Zeal
summary: Divine energy fills your weapon.

name: Shield of Grace
summary: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

name: Celestial Form
summary: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

name: Fiendish Form
summary: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

name: Rejuvenating Touch
summary: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

name: Ultimate Mercy
summary: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
summary: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

name: Banishing Blow
summary: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

name: Celestial Mount
summary: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

name: Everdistant Defense
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

name: Fiendish Mount
summary: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

name: Radiant Blade Master
summary: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

name: Sacred Defender
summary: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

name: Shield Paragon
summary: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.
